author: Cheryl Winokur Munk
title: How Grad Students Can Search for Scholarships
text:
A new online tool makes it easier for students to hunt for graduate-school scholarships—and there are a lot out there to find.
Sallie Mae’s free Graduate School Scholarship Search tool can be used to peruse some 850,000 need-based and merit-based scholarships totaling about $1 billion, according to the company, which specializes in providing private student loans.
